Manchester United will reportedly use Andreas Pereira as a ‘bargaining chip’ to sign Fiorentina defender Nikola MilenkoviÄ‡.

Pereira is likely to leave Old Trafford in search of more first team opportunities and has been linked with the Serie A side.

The 21-year-old was briefly linked to United in July but was usurped by Toby Alderweireld and Jérôme Boateng – neither of whom ended up signing.La Nazione do state, however, that Pereira would have the final say in any deal.
